com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap
Class FeatureDissolver

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap.FeatureDissolver

public class FeatureDissolver
extends java.lang.Object

Dissolve features in base of a given dissolve criteria.

By 'dissolving' we understand the union of the geometry of many features

Author:
azabala

process

public void process(int index1,
                    com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.layers.ReadableVectorial va,
                    com.iver.utiles.swing.threads.CancellableMonitorable cancel)
             throws com.hardcode.gdbms.driver.exceptions.ReadDriverException,
                    com.iver.cit.gvsig.exceptions.expansionfile.ExpansionFileReadException,
                    com.iver.cit.gvsig.exceptions.visitors.VisitorException
Processes the given feature looking for features to dissolve with. The criteria to decide if dissolve two features is given by IDissolveCriteria.

Parameters:
criteria - decides if dissolve two features
index1 - index of feature we are processing
va - it reads geometry of features
cancel - listen cancelations
Throws:
com.iver.cit.gvsig.exceptions.expansionfile.ExpansionFileReadException
com.hardcode.gdbms.driver.exceptions.ReadDriverException
com.iver.cit.gvsig.exceptions.visitors.VisitorException
ProcessWriterException
